message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway.
